projectDesc.p: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts aims to establish a corpus of Indic texts marked up according to the guidelines of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI).

encodingDesc.p: The published edition from which this e-text was originally transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)

refsDecl.p: References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line: e.g., AHS1.9.019a/ refers to Das and Emmerick's edition of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā, Part 1, Chapter 9, Verse 19, Line 1 - Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., op. cit..
Part and Chapter headings are from: Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, op. cit..
Page references have been placed in the body of the text at ten verse intervals: e.g., -- 6 -- refers to the SARIT transcript, page 6.

Page references to Kuṇṭe and Navare's edition of the Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Kuṇṭe and Navare's 1902 edition, pages 12 to 18 - Kuṇṭe, A.M. and Navare, K., op. cit..

Page references to Vogel's edition and English translation of the Tibetan and Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Vogel's 1965 edition and translation, pages 82 to 120 - Vogel, Claus, op. cit..

encodingDesc.p:
Anusvāra is transliterated by:
ṅ before gutturals
ñ before palatals
ṇ before cerebrals
n before dentals
m before labials
Members of a compound are separated by periods.
The base e-text was typed, analyzed and proofread by R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick.

lg.l: AHS1.1.001a/ rāgādi.rogān satatānuṣaktān a.śeṣa.kāya.prasṛtān a.śeṣān |
AHS1.1.001c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.dāñ jaghāna yo '.pūrva.vaidyāya namo 'stu tasmai || 1 ||
AHS1.1.002a/ āyuḥ.kāmayamānena dharmārtha.sukha.sādhanam |
AHS1.1.002c/ āyur.vedopadeśeṣu vidheyaḥ param ādaraḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.1.003a/ brahmā smṛtvāyuṣo vedaṃ prajāpatim ajigrahat |
AHS1.1.003c/ so 'śvinau tau sahasrākṣaṃ so 'tri.putrādikān munīn || 3 ||
AHS1.1.004a/ te 'gniveśādikāṃs te tu pṛthak tantrāṇi tenire |
AHS1.1.004c/ tebhyo 'ti.viprakīrṇebhyaḥ prāyaḥ sāra.taroccayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.1.005a/ kriyate 'ṣṭāṅga.hṛdayaṃ nāti.saṅkṣepa.vistaram |
AHS1.1.005c/ kāya.bāla.grahordhvāṅga.śalya.daṃṣṭrā.jarā.vṛṣān || 5 || AHS1.1.005v/ 1.5bv nāti.saṅkṣipta.vistṛtam
AHS1.1.006a/ aṣṭāv aṅgāni tasyāhuś cikitsā yeṣu saṃśritā |
AHS1.1.006c/ vāyuḥ pittaṃ kaphaś ceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.1.007a/ vikṛtā.vikṛtā dehaṃ ghnanti te vartayanti ca |
AHS1.1.007c/ te vyāpino 'pi hṛn.nābhyor adho.madhyordhva.saṃśrayāḥ || 7 || AHS1.1.007v/ 1.7bv ghnanti te vardhayanti ca
AHS1.1.008a/ vayo.'ho.rātri.bhuktānāṃ te 'nta.madhyādi.gāḥ kramāt |
AHS1.1.008c/ tair bhaved viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś cāgniḥ samaiḥ samaḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.1.009a/ koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdur madhyo madhyaḥ syāt taiḥ samair api |
AHS1.1.009c/ śukrārtava.sthair janmādau viṣeṇeva viṣa.krimeḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.1.010a/ taiś ca tisraḥ prakṛtayo hīna.madhyottamāḥ pṛthak |
AHS1.1.010c/ sama.dhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvi.doṣa.jāḥ || 10 || AHS1.1.010v/ 1.10cv sama.dhātuḥ samais tāsu
AHS1.1.011a/ tatra rūkṣo laghuḥ śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaś calo 'nilaḥ |
AHS1.1.011c/ pittaṃ sa.sneha.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ laghu visraṃ saraṃ dravam || 11 ||
AHS1.1.012a/ snigdhaḥ śīto gurur mandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ kaphaḥ |
AHS1.1.012c/ saṃsargaḥ sannipātaś ca tad.dvi.tri.kṣaya.kopataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.1.013a/ rasāsṛṅ.māṃsa.medo.'sthi.majja.śukrāṇi dhātavaḥ |
AHS1.1.013c/ sapta dūṣyā malā mūtra.śakṛt.svedādayo 'pi ca || 13 ||
AHS1.1.014a/ vṛddhiḥ samānaiḥ sarveṣāṃ viparītair viparyayaḥ |
AHS1.1.014c/ rasāḥ svādv.amla.lavaṇa.tiktoṣaṇa.kaṣāyakāḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.1.015a/ ṣaḍ dravyam āśritās te ca yathā.pūrvaṃ balāvahāḥ |
AHS1.1.015c/ tatrādyā mārutaṃ ghnanti trayas tiktādayaḥ kapham || 15 ||
AHS1.1.016a/ kaṣāya.tikta.madhurāḥ pittam anye tu kurvate |
AHS1.1.016c/ śamanaṃ kopanaṃ svastha.hitaṃ dravyam iti tri.dhā || 16 ||
AHS1.1.017a/ uṣṇa.śīta.guṇotkarṣāt tatra vīryaṃ dvi.dhā smṛtam |
AHS1.1.017c/ tri.dhā vipāko dravyasya svādv.amla.kaṭukātmakaḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.1.018a/ guru.manda.hima.snigdha.ślakṣṇa.sāndra.mṛdu.sthirāḥ |
AHS1.1.018c/ guṇāḥ sa.sūkṣma.viśadā viṃśatiḥ sa.viparyayāḥ || 18 ||
AHS1.1.019a/ kālārtha.karmaṇāṃ yogo hīna.mithyāti.mātrakaḥ |
AHS1.1.019c/ samyag.yogaś ca vijñeyo rogārogyaika.kāraṇam || 19 ||
AHS1.1.020a/ rogas tu doṣa.vaiṣamyaṃ doṣa.sāmyam a.roga.tā |
AHS1.1.020c/ nijāgantu.vibhāgena tatra rogā dvi.dhā smṛtāḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.1.021a/ teṣāṃ kāya.mano.bhedād adhiṣṭhānam api dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.021c/ rajas tamaś ca manaso dvau ca doṣāv udāhṛtau || 21 || AHS1.1.021v/ 1.21dv 'tra dvau doṣāv udāhṛtau
AHS1.1.022a/ darśana.sparśana.praśnaiḥ parīkṣeta ca rogiṇam |
AHS1.1.022c/ rogaṃ nidāna.prāg.rūpa.lakṣaṇopaśayāptibhiḥ || 22 || AHS1.1.022v/ 1.22bv samparīkṣeta rogiṇam 1.22bv parīkṣetātha rogiṇam
AHS1.1.023a/ bhūmi.deha.prabhedena deśam āhur iha dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.023c/ jāṅgalaṃ vāta.bhūyiṣṭham anūpaṃ tu kapholbaṇam || 23 ||
AHS1.1.024a/ sādhāraṇaṃ sama.malaṃ tri.dhā bhū.deśam ādiśet |
AHS1.1.024c/ kṣaṇādir vyādhy.avasthā ca kālo bheṣaja.yoga.kṛt || 24 ||
AHS1.1.025a/ śodhanaṃ śamanaṃ ceti samāsād auṣadhaṃ dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.025c/ śarīra.jānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ krameṇa paramauṣadham || 25 ||
AHS1.1.026a/ vastir vireko vamanaṃ tathā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu |
AHS1.1.026c/ dhī.dhairyātmādi.vijñānaṃ mano.doṣauṣadhaṃ param || 26 ||
AHS1.1.027a/ bhiṣag dravyāṇy upasthātā rogī pāda.catuṣṭayam |
AHS1.1.027c/ cikitsitasya nirdiṣṭaṃ praty.ekaṃ tac catur.guṇam || 27 ||
AHS1.1.028a/ dakṣas tīrthātta.śāstrārtho dṛṣṭa.karmā śucir bhiṣak |
AHS1.1.028c/ bahu.kalpaṃ bahu.guṇaṃ sampannaṃ yogyam auṣadham || 28 ||
AHS1.1.029a/ anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣo buddhi.mān paricārakaḥ |
AHS1.1.029c/ āḍhyo rogī bhiṣag.vaśyo jñāpakaḥ sat.tva.vān api || 29 ||
AHS1.1.029+(1)a/ sādhyo '.sādhya iti vyādhir dvi.dhā tau tu punar dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.029+(1)c/ su.sādhyaḥ kṛcchra.sādhyaś ca yāpyo yaś cān.upakramaḥ || 29+(1) ||
AHS1.1.030a/ sarvauṣadha.kṣame dehe yūnaḥ puṃso jitātmanaḥ |
AHS1.1.030c/ a.marma.go 'lpa.hetv.agra.rūpa.rūpo 'n.upadravaḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.1.031a/ a.tulya.dūṣya.deśartu.prakṛtiḥ pāda.sampadi |
AHS1.1.031c/ graheṣv anu.guṇeṣv eka.doṣa.mārgo navaḥ sukhaḥ || 31 ||
AHS1.1.032a/ śastrādi.sādhanaḥ kṛcchraḥ saṅkare ca tato gadaḥ |
AHS1.1.032c/ śeṣa.tvād āyuṣo yāpyaḥ pathyābhyāsād viparyaye || 32 ||
AHS1.1.033a/ an.upakrama eva syāt sthito 'ty.anta.viparyaye |
AHS1.1.033c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.kṛd dṛṣṭa.riṣṭo 'kṣa.nāśanaḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.1.034a/ tyajed ārtaṃ bhiṣag.bhūpair dviṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ dviṣaṃ dviṣam |
AHS1.1.034c/ hīnopakaraṇaṃ vyagram a.vidheyaṃ gatāyuṣam || 34 ||
AHS1.1.035a/ caṇḍaṃ śokāturaṃ bhīruṃ kṛta.ghnaṃ vaidya.māninam |
AHS1.1.035c/ tantrasyāsya paraṃ cāto vakṣyate 'dhyāya.saṅgrahaḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.1.036a/ āyuṣ.kāma.dinartv.īhā.rogān.utpādana.dravāḥ |
AHS1.1.036c/ anna.jñānānna.saṃrakṣā.mātrā.dravya.rasāśrayāḥ || 36 ||
AHS1.1.037a/ doṣādi.jñāna.tad.bheda.tac.cikitsā.dvy.upakramāḥ |
AHS1.1.037c/ śuddhy.ādi.snehana.sveda.rekāsthāpana.nāvanam || 37 ||
AHS1.1.038a/ dhūma.gaṇḍūṣa.dṛk.seka.tṛpti.yantraka.śastrakam |
AHS1.1.038c/ sirā.vidhiḥ śalya.vidhiḥ śastra.kṣārāgni.karmikau || 38 || AHS1.1.038v/ 1.38cv sirā.vyadhaḥ śalya.vidhiḥ
AHS1.1.039a/ sūtra.sthānam ime 'dhyāyās triṃśac chārīram ucyate |
AHS1.1.039c/ garbhāvakrānti.tad.vyāpad.aṅga.marma.vibhāgikam || 39 ||
AHS1.1.040a/ vikṛtir dūta.jaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ nidānaṃ sārvarogikam |
AHS1.1.040c/ jvarāsṛk.śvāsa.yakṣmādi.madādy.arśo.'tisāriṇām || 40 ||
AHS1.1.041a/ mūtrāghāta.pramehāṇāṃ vidradhy.ādy.udarasya ca |
AHS1.1.041c/ pāṇḍu.kuṣṭhānilārtānāṃ vātāsrasya ca ṣo.ḍaśa || 41 ||
AHS1.1.042a/ cikitsitaṃ jvare rakte kāse śvāse ca yakṣmaṇi |
AHS1.1.042c/ vamau madātyaye 'rśaḥsu viṣi dvau dvau ca mūtrite || 42 ||
AHS1.1.043a/ vidradhau gulma.jaṭhara.pāṇḍu.śopha.visarpiṣu |
AHS1.1.043c/ kuṣṭha.śvitrānila.vyādhi.vātāsreṣu cikitsitam || 43 ||
AHS1.1.044a/ dvā.viṃśatir ime 'dhyāyāḥ kalpa.siddhir ataḥ param |
AHS1.1.044c/ kalpo vamer virekasya tat.siddhir vasti.kalpanā || 44 ||
AHS1.1.045a/ siddhir vasty.āpadāṃ ṣaṣṭho dravya.kalpo 'ta uttaram |
AHS1.1.045c/ bālopacāre tad.vyādhau tad.grahe dvau ca bhūta.ge || 45 ||
AHS1.1.046a/ unmāde 'tha smṛti.bhraṃśe dvau dvau vartmasu sandhiṣu |
AHS1.1.046c/ dṛk.tamo.liṅga.nāśeṣu trayo dvau dvau ca sarva.ge || 46 ||
AHS1.1.047a/ karṇa.nāsā.mukha.śiro.vraṇe bhaṅge bhagandare |
AHS1.1.047c/ granthy.ādau kṣudra.rogeṣu guhya.roge pṛthag dvayam || 47 ||
AHS1.1.048a/ viṣe bhujaṅge kīṭeṣu mūṣakeṣu rasāyane |
AHS1.1.048c/ catvāriṃśo 'n.apatyānām adhyāyo bīja.poṣaṇaḥ || 48 || AHS1.1.048v/ 1.48dv adhyāyo bīja.poṣaṇe
AHS1.1.048ū̆/ ity adhyāya.śataṃ viṃśaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ sthānair udīritam || 48ū̆ ||
AHS1.2.001a/ brāhme muhūrta uttiṣṭhet svastho rakṣārtham āyuṣaḥ |
AHS1.2.001c/ śarīra.cintāṃ nirvartya kṛta.śauca.vidhis tataḥ || 1 ||
AHS1.2.002a/ arka.nyagrodha.khadira.karañja.kakubhādi.jam |
AHS1.2.002c/ prātar bhuktvā ca mṛdv.agraṃ kaṣāya.kaṭu.tiktakam || 2 ||
AHS1.2.003a/ kanīny.agra.sama.sthaulyaṃ praguṇaṃ dvā.daśāṅgulam |
AHS1.2.003c/ bhakṣayed danta.pavanaṃ danta.māṃsāny a.bādhayan || 3 || AHS1.2.003v/ 2.3cv bhakṣayed danta.dhavanaṃ
AHS1.2.004a/ nādyād a.jīrṇa.vamathu.śvāsa.kāsa.jvarārditī |
AHS1.2.004c/ tṛṣṇāsya.pāka.hṛn.netra.śiraḥ.karṇāmayī ca tat || 4 ||
AHS1.2.005a/ sauvīram añjanaṃ nityaṃ hitam akṣṇos tato bhajet |
AHS1.2.005c/ cakṣus tejo.mayaṃ tasya viśeṣāc chleṣmato bhayam || 5 || AHS1.2.005v/ 2.5dv viśeṣāc chleṣmaṇo bhayam
AHS1.2.005.1+1a/ bhukta.vāṃś ca śiraḥ.snātaḥ śrāntaḥ chardana.nāvanaiḥ |
AHS1.2.005.1+1c/ rātrau jāgaritaś cāpi nāñjyāj jvarita eva ca || 5.1+1 ||
AHS1.2.006a/ yojayet sapta.rātre 'smāt srāvaṇārthaṃ rasāñjanam |
AHS1.2.006c/ tato nāvana.gaṇḍūṣa.dhūma.tāmbūla.bhāg bhavet || 6 || AHS1.2.006v/ 2.6bv srāvaṇārthe rasāñjanam
AHS1.2.007a/ tāmbūlaṃ kṣata.pittāsra.rūkṣotkupita.cakṣuṣām |
AHS1.2.007c/ viṣa.mūrchā.madārtānām a.pathyaṃ śoṣiṇām api || 7 ||
AHS1.2.008a/ abhyaṅgam ācaren nityaṃ sa jarā.śrama.vāta.hā |
AHS1.2.008c/ dṛṣṭi.prasāda.puṣṭy.āyuḥ.svapna.su.tvak.tva.dārḍhya.kṛt || 8 ||
AHS1.2.009a/ śiraḥ.śravaṇa.pādeṣu taṃ viśeṣeṇa śīlayet |
AHS1.2.009c/ varjyo 'bhyaṅgaḥ kapha.grasta.kṛta.saṃśuddhy.a.jīrṇibhiḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.2.010a/ lāghavaṃ karma.sāmarthyaṃ dīpto 'gnir medasaḥ kṣayaḥ |
AHS1.2.010c/ vibhakta.ghana.gātra.tvaṃ vyāyāmād upajāyate || 10 ||
AHS1.2.011a/ vāta.pittāmayī bālo vṛddho '.jīrṇo ca taṃ tyajet |
AHS1.2.011c/ ardha.śaktyā niṣevyas tu balibhiḥ snigdha.bhojibhiḥ || 11 ||
AHS1.2.012a/ śīta.kāle vasante ca mandam eva tato 'nya.dā |
AHS1.2.012c/ taṃ kṛtvānu.sukhaṃ dehaṃ mardayec ca samantataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.2.013a/ tṛṣṇā kṣayaḥ pratamako rakta.pittaṃ śramaḥ klamaḥ |
AHS1.2.013c/ ati.vyāyāmataḥ kāso jvaraś chardiś ca jāyate || 13 ||
AHS1.2.014a/ vyāyāma.jāgarādhva.strī.hāsya.bhāṣyādi.sāhasam |
AHS1.2.014c/ gajaṃ siṃha ivākarṣan bhajann ati vinaśyati || 14 || AHS1.2.014v/ 2.14dv bhajan yato 'ti naśyati
AHS1.2.015a/ udvartanaṃ kapha.haraṃ medasaḥ pravilāyanam |
AHS1.2.015c/ sthirī.karaṇam aṅgānāṃ tvak.prasāda.karaṃ param || 15 ||

AHS1.12.001a/ pakvāśaya.kaṭī.sakthi.śrotrāsthi.sparśanendriyam |

AHS1.13.001a/ vātasyopakramaḥ snehaḥ svedaḥ saṃśodhanaṃ mṛdu |

AHS1.19.002a/ nirūho 'nvāsanaṃ vastir uttaras tena sādhayet |
AHS1.19.002c/ gulmānāha.khuḍa.plīha.śuddhātīsāra.śūlinaḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.19.003a/ jīrṇa.jvara.pratiśyāya.śukrānila.mala.grahān |
AHS1.19.003c/ vardhmāśmarī.rajo.nāśān dāruṇāṃś cānilāmayān || 3 ||
AHS1.19.004a/ an.āsthāpyās tv ati.snigdhaḥ kṣatorasko bhṛśaṃ kṛśaḥ |
AHS1.19.004c/ āmātīsārī vami.mān saṃśuddho datta.nāvanaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.19.005a/ śvāsa.kāsa.prasekārśo.hidhmādhmānālpa.vahnayaḥ |

AHS1.19.006a/ kuṣṭhī ca madhu.mehī ca māsān sapta ca garbhiṇī |
AHS1.19.006c/ āsthāpyā eva cānvāsyā viśeṣād ati.vahnayaḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.19.007a/ rūkṣāḥ kevala.vātārtā nānuvāsyās ta eva ca |
AHS1.19.007c/ ye 'n.āsthāpyās tathā pāṇḍu.kāmalā.meha.pīnasāḥ || 7 ||
AHS1.19.008a/ nir.anna.plīha.viḍ.bhedi.guru.koṣṭha.kaphodarāḥ |
AHS1.19.008c/ abhiṣyandi.bhṛśa.sthūla.kṛmi.koṣṭhāḍhya.mārutāḥ || 8 || AHS1.19.008v/ 19.8bv .guru.koṣṭhaḥ kaphodarī 19.8cv abhiṣyandi.kṛśa.sthūla.
AHS1.19.009a/ pīte viṣe gare 'pacyāṃ ślīpadī gala.gaṇḍa.vān |
AHS1.19.009c/ tayos tu netraṃ hemādi.dhātu.dārv.asthi.veṇu.jam || 9 ||
AHS1.19.010a/ go.pucchākāram a.cchidraṃ ślakṣṇarju guṭikā.mukham |
AHS1.19.010c/ ūne 'bde pañca pūrṇe 'sminn ā.saptabhyo 'ṅgulāni ṣaṭ || 10 ||
AHS1.19.011a/ saptame sapta tāny aṣṭau dvā.daśe ṣo.ḍaśe nava |
AHS1.19.011c/ dvā.daśaiva paraṃ viṃśād vīkṣya varṣāntareṣu ca || 11 ||
AHS1.19.012a/ vayo.bala.śarīrāṇi pramāṇam abhivardhayet |
AHS1.19.012c/ svāṅguṣṭhena samaṃ mūle sthaulyenāgre kaniṣṭhayā || 12 ||
AHS1.19.013a/ pūrṇe 'bde 'ṅgulam ādāya tad.ardhārdha.pravardhitam |
AHS1.19.013c/ try.aṅgulaṃ paramaṃ chidraṃ mūle 'gre vahate tu yat || 13 ||
AHS1.19.014a/ mudgaṃ māṣaṃ kalāyaṃ ca klinnaṃ karkandhukaṃ kramāt |
AHS1.19.014c/ mūla.cchidra.pramāṇena prānte ghaṭita.karṇikam || 14 ||
AHS1.19.015a/ vartyāgre pihitaṃ mūle yathā.svaṃ dvy.aṅgulāntaram |
AHS1.19.015c/ karṇikā.dvitayaṃ netre kuryāt tatra ca yojayet || 15 || AHS1.19.015v/ 19.15bv yathā.svaṃ dvy.aṅgulāntare 19.15dv kuryāt tatra prayojayet 19.15dv kuryāt tatra tu yojayet
AHS1.19.016a/ ajāvi.mahiṣādīnāṃ vastiṃ su.mṛditaṃ dṛḍham |
AHS1.19.016c/ kaṣāya.raktaṃ niś.chidra.granthi.gandha.siraṃ tanum || 16 || AHS1.19.016v/ 19.16av go.'jāvi.mahiṣādīnāṃ
AHS1.19.017a/ grathitaṃ sādhu sūtreṇa sukha.saṃsthāpya.bheṣajam |
AHS1.19.017c/ vasty.a.bhāve 'ṅka.pādaṃ vā nyased vāso 'tha.vā ghanam || 17 || AHS1.19.017v/ 19.17av granthitaṃ sādhu sūtreṇa
AHS1.19.018a/ nirūha.mātrā prathame prakuñco vatsare param |
AHS1.19.018c/ prakuñca.vṛddhiḥ praty.abdaṃ yāvat ṣaṭ prasṛtās tataḥ || 18 || AHS1.19.018v/ 19.18bv prakuñco vatsarāt param
AHS1.19.019a/ prasṛtaṃ vardhayed ūrdhvaṃ dvā.daśāṣṭā.daśasya tu |
AHS1.19.019c/ ā.saptater idaṃ mānaṃ daśaiva prasṛtāḥ param || 19 || AHS1.19.019v/ 19.19bv dvā.daśāṣṭā.daśasya ca
AHS1.19.020a/ yathā.yathaṃ nirūhasya pādo mātrānuvāsane |
AHS1.19.020c/ āsthāpyaṃ snehitaṃ svinnaṃ śuddhaṃ labdha.balaṃ punaḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.19.021a/ anvāsanārhaṃ vijñāya pūrvam evānuvāsayet |
AHS1.19.021c/ śīte vasante ca divā rātrau ke.cit tato 'nya.dā || 21 || AHS1.19.021v/ 19.21dv rātrau ke.cit tato 'nya.thā
AHS1.19.022a/ abhyakta.snātam ucitāt pāda.hīnaṃ hitaṃ laghu |
AHS1.19.022c/ a.snigdha.rūkṣam aśitaṃ sānu.pānaṃ dravādi ca || 22 || AHS1.19.022v/ 19.22dv sānu.pānaṃ dravādi vā
AHS1.19.023a/ kṛta.caṅkramaṇaṃ mukta.viṇ.mūtraṃ śayane sukhe |
AHS1.19.023c/ nāty.ucchrite na coc.chīrṣe saṃviṣṭaṃ vāma.pārśvataḥ || 23 ||
AHS1.19.024a/ saṅkocya dakṣiṇaṃ sakthi prasārya ca tato 'param |
AHS1.19.024c/ athāsya netraṃ praṇayet snigdhe snigdha.mukhaṃ gude || 24 || AHS1.19.024v/ 19.24dv snigdhaṃ snigdha.mukhe gude
AHS1.19.025a/ ucchvāsya vaster vadane baddhe hastam a.kampayan |
AHS1.19.025c/ pṛṣṭha.vaṃśaṃ prati tato nāti.druta.vilambitam || 25 ||
AHS1.19.026a/ nāti.vegaṃ na vā mandaṃ sakṛd eva prapīḍayet |
AHS1.19.026c/ sāvaśeṣaṃ ca kurvīta vāyuḥ śeṣe hi tiṣṭhati || 26 || AHS1.19.026v/ 19.26cv sāvaśeṣaṃ prakurvīta
AHS1.19.027a/ datte tūttāna.dehasya pāṇinā tāḍayet sphijau |
AHS1.19.027c/ tat.pārṣṇibhyāṃ tathā śayyāṃ pādataś ca trir utkṣipet || 27 ||
AHS1.19.028a/ tataḥ prasāritāṅgasya sopadhānasya pārṣṇike |
AHS1.19.028c/ āhanyān muṣṭināṅgaṃ ca snehenābhyajya mardayet || 28 ||
AHS1.19.029a/ vedanārtam iti sneho na hi śīghraṃ nivartate |
AHS1.19.029c/ yojyaḥ śīghraṃ nivṛtte 'nyaḥ sneho '.tiṣṭhann a.kārya.kṛt || 29 ||
AHS1.19.030a/ dīptāgniṃ tv āgata.snehaṃ sāyāhne bhojayel laghu |
AHS1.19.030c/ nivṛtti.kālaḥ paramas trayo yāmas tataḥ param || 30 ||
AHS1.19.031a/ aho.rātram upekṣeta parataḥ phala.vartibhiḥ |
AHS1.19.031c/ tīkṣṇair vā vastibhiḥ kuryād yatnaṃ sneha.nivṛttaye || 31 ||
AHS1.19.032a/ ati.raukṣyād an.āgacchan na cej jāḍyādi.doṣa.kṛt |
AHS1.19.032c/ upekṣetaiva hi tato 'dhyuṣitaś ca niśāṃ pibet || 32 ||
AHS1.19.033a/ prātar nāgara.dhānyāmbhaḥ koṣṇaṃ kevalam eva vā |
AHS1.19.033c/ anvāsayet tṛtīye 'hni pañcame vā punaś ca tam || 33 ||
AHS1.19.034a/ yathā vā sneha.paktiḥ syād ato 'ty.ulbaṇa.mārutān |
AHS1.19.034c/ vyāyāma.nityān dīptāgnīn rūkṣāṃś ca prati.vāsaram || 34 ||
AHS1.19.034+1a/ ādhmāna.saṅkoca.purīṣa.bandha.kṣīṇendriya.tvā.ruci.bhaṅga.śūlāḥ |
AHS1.19.034+1c/ pāṅgulya.śākhāśrita.vāta.bhagna.bandhāś ca sādhyā hy anuvāsanena || 34+1 || AHS1.19.034+1v/ 19.34+1dv .vātāś ca sādhyā hy anuvāsanena
AHS1.19.035a/ iti snehais tri.caturaiḥ snigdhe sroto.viśuddhaye |
AHS1.19.035c/ nirūhaṃ śodhanaṃ yuñjyād a.snigdhe snehanaṃ tanoḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.19.036a/ pañcame 'tha tṛtīye vā divase sādhake śubhe |
AHS1.19.036c/ madhyāhne kiñ.cid.āvṛtte prayukte bali.maṅgale || 36 ||
AHS1.19.037a/ abhyakta.sveditotsṛṣṭa.malaṃ nāti.bubhukṣitam |
AHS1.19.037c/ avekṣya puruṣaṃ doṣa.bheṣajādīni cādarāt || 37 || AHS1.19.037v/ 19.37cv avetya puruṣaṃ doṣa.
AHS1.19.038a/ vastiṃ prakalpayed vaidyas tad.vidyair bahubhiḥ saha |
AHS1.19.038c/ kvāthayed viṃśati.palaṃ dravyasyāṣṭau phalāni ca || 38 || AHS1.19.038v/ 19.38bv tad.vedyair bahubhiḥ saha 19.38bv tad.vidhair bahubhiḥ saha
AHS1.19.039a/ tataḥ kvāthāc caturthāṃśaṃ snehaṃ vāte prakalpayet |
AHS1.19.039c/ pitte svasthe ca ṣaṣṭhāṃśam aṣṭamāṃśaṃ kaphe 'dhike || 39 || AHS1.19.039v/ 19.39bv snehaṃ vāte 'nu kalpayet 19.39bv snehaṃ vāte tu kalpayet
AHS1.19.040a/ sarva.tra cāṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ kalkād bhavati vā yathā |
AHS1.19.040c/ nāty.accha.sāndra.tā vasteḥ pala.mātraṃ guḍasya ca || 40 ||
AHS1.19.041a/ madhu.paṭv.ādi.śeṣaṃ ca yuktyā sarvaṃ tad ekataḥ |
AHS1.19.041c/ uṣṇāmbu.kumbhī.bāṣpeṇa taptaṃ khaja.samāhatam || 41 ||
AHS1.19.042a/ prakṣipya vastau praṇayet pāyau nāty.uṣṇa.śītalam |
AHS1.19.042c/ nāti.snigdhaṃ na vā rūkṣaṃ nāti.tīkṣṇaṃ na vā mṛdu || 42 ||
AHS1.19.043a/ nāty.accha.sāndraṃ nonāti.mātraṃ nā.paṭu nāti ca |
AHS1.19.043c/ lavaṇaṃ tad.vad amlaṃ ca paṭhanty anye tu tad.vidaḥ || 43 || AHS1.19.043v/ 19.43dv vadanty anye tu tad.vidaḥ
AHS1.19.044a/ mātrāṃ tri.palikāṃ kuryāt sneha.mākṣikayoḥ pṛthak |
AHS1.19.044c/ karṣārdhaṃ māṇimanthasya svasthe kalka.pala.dvayam || 44 ||
AHS1.19.045a/ sarva.dravāṇāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ palāni daśa kalpayet |
AHS1.19.045c/ mākṣikaṃ lavaṇaṃ snehaṃ kalkaṃ kvātham iti kramāt || 45 ||
AHS1.19.046a/ āvapeta nirūhāṇām eṣa saṃyojane vidhiḥ |
AHS1.19.046c/ uttāno datta.mātre tu nirūhe tan.manā bhavet || 46 ||
AHS1.19.047a/ kṛtopadhānaḥ sañjāta.vegaś cotkaṭakaḥ sṛjet |
AHS1.19.047c/ āgatau paramaḥ kālo muhūrto mṛtyave param || 47 || AHS1.19.047v/ 19.47bv .vegaś cotkaṭukaḥ sṛjet 19.47bv .vegaś cotkuṭakaḥ sṛjet 19.47dv muhūrto mṛtyave paraḥ
AHS1.19.048a/ tatrānulomikaṃ sneha.kṣāra.mūtrāmla.kalpitam |
AHS1.19.048c/ tvaritaṃ snigdha.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ vastim anyaṃ prapīḍayet || 48 || AHS1.19.048v/ 19.48av tatrānulomika.sneha.
AHS1.19.049a/ vidadyāt phala.vartiṃ vā svedanottrāsanādi ca |
AHS1.19.049c/ svayam eva nivṛtte tu dvitīyo vastir iṣyate || 49 || AHS1.19.049v/ 19.49bv svedanotrāsanādi vā
AHS1.19.050a/ tṛtīyo 'pi caturtho 'pi yāvad vā su.nirūḍha.tā |
AHS1.19.050c/ virikta.vac ca yogādīn vidyād yoge tu bhojayet || 50 || AHS1.19.050v/ 19.50bv yāvad vā su.nirūha.tā 19.50dv vidyād yoge tu yojayet
AHS1.19.051a/ koṣṇena vāriṇā snātaṃ tanu.dhanva.rasaudanam |
AHS1.19.051c/ vikārā ye nirūḍhasya bhavanti pracalair malaiḥ || 51 || AHS1.19.051v/ 19.51av koṣṇena vāriṇā snānaṃ 19.51cv vikārā ye nirūhasya
AHS1.19.052a/ te sukhoṣṇāmbu.siktasya yānti bhukta.vataḥ śamam |
AHS1.19.052c/ atha vātārditaṃ bhūyaḥ sadya evānuvāsayet || 52 ||
AHS1.19.053a/ samyag.dhīnāti.yogāś ca tasya syuḥ sneha.pīta.vat |
AHS1.19.053c/ kiñ.cit.kālaṃ sthito yaś ca sa.purīṣo nivartate || 53 || AHS1.19.053v/ 19.53cv kiñ.cit.kālaṃ sthito yasya
AHS1.19.054a/ sānulomānilaḥ snehas tat siddham anuvāsanam |
AHS1.19.054c/ ekaṃ trīn vā balāse tu sneha.vastīn prakalpayet || 54 || AHS1.19.054v/ 19.54dv sneha.vastīn prayojayet
AHS1.19.055a/ pañca vā sapta vā pitte navaikā.daśa vānile |
AHS1.19.055c/ punas tato 'py a.yugmāṃs tu punar āsthāpanaṃ tataḥ || 55 ||
AHS1.19.056a/ kapha.pittānileṣv annaṃ yūṣa.kṣīra.rasaiḥ kramāt |
AHS1.19.056c/ vāta.ghnauṣadha.niḥkvātha.trivṛtā.saindhavair yutaḥ || 56 ||
AHS1.19.057a/ vastir eko 'nile snigdhaḥ svādv.amloṣṇo rasānvitaḥ |
AHS1.19.057c/ nyagrodhādi.gaṇa.kvātha.padmakādi.sitā.yutau || 57 || AHS1.19.057v/ 19.57bv svādv.amloṣṇa.rasānvitaḥ
AHS1.19.058a/ pitte svādu.himau sājya.kṣīrekṣu.rasa.mākṣikau |
AHS1.19.058c/ āragvadhādi.niḥkvātha.vatsakādi.yutās trayaḥ || 58 ||
AHS1.19.059a/ rūkṣāḥ sa.kṣaudra.go.mūtrās tīkṣṇoṣṇa.kaṭukāḥ kaphe |
AHS1.19.059c/ trayas te sannipāte 'pi doṣān ghnanti yataḥ kramāt || 59 || AHS1.19.059v/ 19.59cv trayaś ca sannipāte 'pi
AHS1.19.060a/ tribhyaḥ paraṃ vastim ato necchanty anye cikitsakāḥ |
AHS1.19.060c/ na hi doṣaś caturtho 'sti punar dīyeta yaṃ prati || 60 || AHS1.19.060v/ 19.60av nācārya.carakasyāto 19.60bv vastis tribhyaḥ paraṃ mataḥ
AHS1.19.061a/ utkleśanaṃ śuddhi.karaṃ doṣāṇāṃ śamanaṃ kramāt |
AHS1.19.061c/ tri.dhaiva kalpayed vastim ity anye 'pi pracakṣate || 61 || AHS1.19.061v/ 19.61cv tri.dhaivaṃ kalpayed vastim
AHS1.19.062a/ doṣauṣadhādi.balataḥ sarvam etat pramāṇayet |
AHS1.19.062c/ samyaṅ.nirūḍha.liṅgaṃ tu nā.sambhāvya nivartayet || 62 ||
AHS1.19.063a/ prāk sneha ekaḥ pañcānte dvā.daśāsthāpanāni ca |
AHS1.19.063c/ sānvāsanāni karmaivaṃ vastayas triṃśad īritāḥ || 63 ||
AHS1.19.064a/ kālaḥ pañca.daśaiko 'tra prāk sneho 'nte trayas tathā |
AHS1.19.064c/ ṣaṭ pañca.vasty.antaritā yogo 'ṣṭau vastayo 'tra tu || 64 ||
AHS1.19.065a/ trayo nirūhāḥ snehāś ca snehāv ādy.antayor ubhau |
AHS1.19.065c/ sneha.vastiṃ nirūhaṃ vā naikam evātiśīlayet || 65 ||
AHS1.19.066a/ utkleśāgni.vadhau snehān nirūhān maruto bhayam |
AHS1.19.066c/ tasmān nirūḍhaḥ snehyaḥ syān nirūhyaś cānuvāsitaḥ || 66 ||
AHS1.19.067a/ sneha.śodhana.yuktyaivaṃ vasti.karma tri.doṣa.jit |
AHS1.19.067c/ hrasvayā sneha.pānasya mātrayā yojitaḥ samaḥ || 67 ||
AHS1.19.068a/ mātrā.vastiḥ smṛtaḥ snehaḥ śīlanīyaḥ sadā ca saḥ |
AHS1.19.068c/ bāla.vṛddhādhva.bhāra.strī.vyāyāmāsakta.cintakaiḥ || 68 || AHS1.19.068v/ 19.68cv bāla.vṛddhādhva.bhāṣya.strī.
AHS1.19.069a/ vāta.bhagnā.balālpāgni.nṛpeśvara.sukhātmabhiḥ |
AHS1.19.069c/ doṣa.ghno niṣ.parīhāro balyaḥ sṛṣṭa.malaḥ sukhaḥ || 69 || AHS1.19.069v/ 19.69bv .nṛpaiśvarya.sukhātmabhiḥ
AHS1.19.070a/ vastau rogeṣu nārīṇāṃ yoni.garbhāśayeṣu ca |
AHS1.19.070c/ dvi.trāsthāpana.śuddhebhyo vidadhyād vastim uttaram || 70 ||
AHS1.19.071a/ āturāṅgula.mānena tan.netraṃ dvā.daśāṅgulam |
AHS1.19.071c/ vṛttaṃ go.puccha.van mūla.madyayoḥ kṛta.karṇikam || 71 ||
AHS1.19.072a/ siddhārthaka.praveśāgraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ hemādi.sambhavam |
AHS1.19.072c/ kundāśvamāra.sumanaḥ.puṣpa.vṛntopamaṃ dṛḍham || 72 ||
AHS1.19.073a/ tasya vastir mṛdu.laghur mātrā śuktir vikalpya vā |
AHS1.19.073c/ atha snātāśītasyāsya sneha.vasti.vidhānataḥ || 73 || AHS1.19.073v/ 19.73bv mātrā śuktir vikalpya ca 19.73bv mātrā śuktiḥ prakalpya vā
AHS1.19.074a/ ṛjoḥ sukhopaviṣṭasya pīṭhe jānu.same mṛdau |
AHS1.19.074c/ hṛṣṭe meḍhre sthite carjau śanaiḥ sroto.viśuddhaye || 74 ||
AHS1.19.075a/ sūkṣmāṃ śalākāṃ praṇayet tayā śuddhe anu.sevani |
AHS1.19.075c/ ā.mehanāntaṃ netraṃ ca niṣ.kampaṃ guda.vat tataḥ || 75 || AHS1.19.075v/ 19.75bv tayā śuddhe anu.sevanīm
AHS1.19.076a/ pīḍite 'ntar.gate snehe sneha.vasti.kramo hitaḥ |
AHS1.19.076c/ vastīn anena vidhinā dadyāt trīṃś caturo 'pi vā || 76 || AHS1.19.076v/ 19.76av pīḍite 'nugate snehe
AHS1.19.077a/ anuvāsana.vac cheṣaṃ sarvam evāsya cintayet |
AHS1.19.077c/ strīṇām ārtava.kāle tu yonir gṛhṇāty apāvṛteḥ || 77 ||
AHS1.19.078a/ vidadhīta tadā tasmād an.ṛtāv api cātyaye |
AHS1.19.078c/ yoni.vibhraṃśa.śūleṣu yoni.vyāpady asṛg.dare || 78 ||
AHS1.19.079a/ netraṃ daśāṅgulaṃ mudga.praveśaṃ catur.aṅgulam |
AHS1.19.079c/ apatya.mārge yojyaṃ syād dvy.aṅgulaṃ mūtra.vartmani || 79 ||
AHS1.19.080a/ mūtra.kṛcchra.vikāreṣu bālānāṃ tv ekam aṅgulam |
AHS1.19.080c/ prakuñco madhyamā mātrā bālānāṃ śuktir eva tu || 80 ||
AHS1.19.081a/ uttānāyāḥ śayānāyāḥ samyak saṅkocya sakthinī |

AHS2.3.034c/ saṅkīrṇā grathitāḥ kṣudrā vakrāḥ sandhiṣu cāśritāḥ || 34 ||

AHS2.3.037a/ praspandinyaś ca vātāsraṃ vahante pitta.śoṇitam |

AHS6.40.057a/ vastir vāta.vikārān paittān rekaḥ kaphodbhavān vamanam |
AHS6.40.057c/ kṣaudraṃ jayati balāsaṃ sarpiḥ pittaṃ samīraṇaṃ tailam || 57 ||
AHS6.40.058a/ ity agryaṃ yat proktaṃ rogāṇām auṣadhaṃ śamāyālam |
AHS6.40.058c/ tad deśa.kāla.balato vikalpanīyaṃ yathā.yogam || 58 ||
AHS6.40.059a/ ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūtraṃ tat.sūktānāṃ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ |

AHS6.40.059c/ bheḍādīnāṃ sammato bhakti.namraḥ papracchedaṃ saṃśayāno 'gniveśaḥ || 59 || AHS6.40.059v/ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamād ārtha.sūkṣmaṃ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūkṣmaṃ 40.59bv tat.sūktīnāṃ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ
AHS6.40.060a/ dṛśyante bhaga.van ke.cid ātma.vanto 'pi rogiṇaḥ |
AHS6.40.060c/ dravyopasthātṛ.sampannā vṛddha.vaidya.matānugāḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.40.061a/ kṣīyamāṇāmaya.prāṇā viparītās tathā 'pare |
AHS6.40.061c/ hitā.hita.vibhāgasya phalaṃ tasmād a.niścitam || 61 ||
AHS6.40.062a/ kiṃ śāsti śāstram asmin iti kalpayato 'gniveśa.mukhyasya |
AHS6.40.062c/ śiṣya.gaṇasya punarvasur ācakhyau kārtsnyatas tat.tvam || 62 || AHS6.40.062v/ 40.62dv ācakṣe kārtsnyatas tat.tvam
AHS6.40.063a/ na cikitsā.cikitsā ca tulyā bhavitum arhati |
AHS6.40.063c/ vināpi kriyayā svāsthyaṃ gacchatāṃ ṣo.ḍaśāṃśayā || 63 ||
AHS6.40.064a/ ātaṅka.paṅka.magnānāṃ hastālambo bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS6.40.064c/ jīvitaṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ sarveṣām eva nauṣadhāt || 64 || AHS6.40.064v/ 40.64dv sarveṣām eva nauṣadham
AHS6.40.065a/ na hy upāyam apekṣante sarve rogā na cānya.thā |
AHS6.40.065c/ upāya.sādhyāḥ sidhyanti nā.hetur hetu.mān yataḥ || 65 || AHS6.40.065v/ 40.65dv no '.hetur hetu.māṃs tataḥ
AHS6.40.066a/ yad uktaṃ sarva.sampatti.yuktayāpi cikitsayā |
AHS6.40.066c/ mṛtyur bhavati tan naivaṃ nopāye 'sty an.upāya.tā || 66 || AHS6.40.066v/ 40.66dv nopāyeṣv an.upāya.tā
AHS6.40.067a/ api copāya.yuktasya dhī.mato jātu cit kriyā |
AHS6.40.067c/ na sidhyed daiva.vaiguṇyān na tv iyaṃ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā || 67 || AHS6.40.067v/ 40.67av apy evopāya.yuktasya 40.67cv na siddhir daiva.vaiguṇyān 40.67dv na nv iyaṃ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā
AHS6.40.068a/ kasyā.siddho 'gni.toyādiḥ sveda.stambhādi.karmaṇi |
AHS6.40.068c/ na prīṇanaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vā kasya kṣīraṃ gavedhukam || 68 || AHS6.40.068v/ 40.68cv na prīṇanaṃ karśanaṃ vā 40.68dv kasya kṣīra.gavedhukam
AHS6.40.069a/ kasya māṣātmaguptādau vṛṣya.tve nāsti niścayaḥ |
AHS6.40.069c/ viṇ.mūtra.karaṇākṣepau kasya saṃśayitau yave || 69 || AHS6.40.069v/ 40.69av kasya māṣātmaguptādyair 40.69bv vṛṣa.tve nāsti niścayaḥ
AHS6.40.070a/ viṣaṃ kasya jarāṃ yāti mantra.tantra.vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.070c/ kaḥ prāptaḥ kalya.tāṃ pathyād ṛte rohiṇikādiṣu || 70 || AHS6.40.070v/ 40.70cv kaḥ prāptaḥ kalpa.tāṃ pathyād
AHS6.40.071a/ api cā.kāla.maraṇaṃ sarva.siddhānta.niścitam |
AHS6.40.071c/ mahatāpi prayatnena vāryatāṃ katham anya.thā || 71 ||
AHS6.40.072a/ candanādy api dāhādau rūḍham āgama.pūrvakam |
AHS6.40.072c/ śāstrād eva gataṃ siddhiṃ jvare laṅghana.bṛṃhaṇam || 72 ||
AHS6.40.073a/ catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampanne samyag ālocya yojite |
AHS6.40.073c/ mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghātaṃ vicikitsāṃ cikitsite || 73 || AHS6.40.073v/ 40.73av catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampūrṇe 40.73cv mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghāte
AHS6.40.074a/ etad dhi mṛtyu.pāśānām a.kāṇḍe chedanaṃ dṛḍham |
AHS6.40.074c/ rogottrāsita.bhītānāṃ rakṣā.sūtram a.sūtrakam || 74 ||
AHS6.40.075a/ etat tad amṛtaṃ sākṣāj jagad.āyāsa.varjitam |
AHS6.40.075c/ yāti hālāhala.tvaṃ tu sadyo dur.bhājana.sthitam || 75 || AHS6.40.075v/ 40.75av etad vedāmṛtaṃ sākṣāj 40.75bv jagaty āyāsa.varjitam 40.75cv yāti hālāhala.tvaṃ ca
AHS6.40.076a/ a.jñāta.śāstra.sad.bhāvāñ chāstra.mātra.parāyaṇān |
AHS6.40.076c/ tyajed dūrād bhiṣak.pāśān pāśān vaivasvatān iva || 76 || AHS6.40.076v/ 40.76cv vivarjayed bhiṣak.pāśān
AHS6.40.077a/ bhiṣajāṃ sādhu.vṛttānāṃ bhadram āgama.śālinām |
AHS6.40.077c/ abhyasta.karmaṇāṃ bhadraṃ bhadraṃ bhadrābhilāṣiṇām || 77 || AHS6.40.077v/ 40.77bv bahu.dhāgama.śālinām 40.77bv bhadram āgama.śīlinām 40.77cv abhyasta.karmaṇāṃ siddhir
AHS6.40.078a/ iti tantra.guṇair yuktaṃ tantra.doṣair vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.078c/ cikitsā.śāstram a.khilaṃ vyāpya yat paritaḥ sthitam || 78 || AHS6.40.078v/ 40.78bv tantra.doṣa.vivarjitam 40.78dv vyāpaṭhya paritaḥ sthitam
AHS6.40.079a/ vipulā.mala.vijñāna.mahā.muni.matānugam |

AHS6.40.079c/ mahā.sāgara.gambhīra.saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam || 79 || AHS6.40.079v/ 40.79av vipulā.mala.vijñānaṃ 40.79cv mahā.sāgara.gambhīraṃ 40.79cv mahā.muni.matānugam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣakam
AHS6.40.080a/ aṣṭāṅga.vaidyaka.mahodadhi.manthanena yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.rāśir āptaḥ |

AHS6.40.080c/ tasmād an.alpa.phalam alpa.samudyamānāṃ prīty.artham etad uditaṃ pṛthag eva tantram || 80 || AHS6.40.080v/ 40.80bv yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.sāra.tulyaḥ 40.80dv prīty.artham evam uditaṃ pṛthag eva tantram
AHS6.40.081a/ idam āgama.siddha.tvāt pratyakṣa.phala.darśanāt |
AHS6.40.081c/ mantra.vat samprayoktavyaṃ na mīmāṃsyaṃ kathañ.ca.na || 81 || AHS6.40.081v/ 40.81av idam āgama.śuddha.tvāt 40.81dv na mīmāṃsyaṃ kadā.ca.na
AHS6.40.082a/ dīrgha.jīvitam ārogyaṃ dharmam arthaṃ sukhaṃ yaśaḥ |
AHS6.40.082c/ pāṭhāvabodhānuṣṭhānair adhigacchaty ato dhruvam || 82 || AHS6.40.082v/ 40.82av dīrghaṃ jīvitam ārogyaṃ
AHS6.40.083a/ etat paṭhan saṅgraha.bodha.śaktaḥ sv.abhyasta.karmā bhiṣag a.prakampyaḥ |
AHS6.40.083c/ ākampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.kṛtābhiyogān yadi tan na citram || 83 || AHS6.40.083v/ 40.83cv yaḥ kampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.
AHS6.40.084a/ yadi carakam adhīte tad dhruvaṃ suśrutādi.praṇigadita.gadānāṃ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ |

AHS6.40.084c/ atha caraka.vihīnaḥ prakriyāyām a.klinnaḥ kim iva khalu karotu vyādhitānāṃ varākaḥ || 84 || AHS6.40.084v/ 40.84bv .praṇigadita.gadānāṃ nāma.mātreṇa bāhyaḥ 40.84bv .pratigadita.gadānāṃ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ 40.84dv kim iha khalu karotu vyādhitānāṃ varākaḥ
AHS6.40.085a/ abhiniveśa.vaśād abhiyujyate su.bhaṇite 'pi na yo dṛḍha.mūḍhakaḥ |
AHS6.40.085c/ paṭhatu yatna.paraḥ puruṣāyuṣaṃ sa khalu vaidyakam ādyam a.nirvidaḥ || 85 ||
AHS6.40.086a/ vāte pitte śleṣma.śāntau ca pathyaṃ tailaṃ sarpir mākṣikaṃ ca krameṇa |
AHS6.40.086c/ etad brahmā bhāṣatāṃ brahma.jo vā kā nir.mantre vaktṛ.bhedokti.śaktiḥ || 86 || AHS6.40.086v/ 40.86cv etad brahmā bhāṣate brahma.jo vā
AHS6.40.087a/ abhidhātṛ.vaśāt kiṃ vā dravya.śaktir viśiṣyate |
AHS6.40.087c/ ato matsaram utsṛjya mādhyasthyam avalambyatām || 87 || AHS6.40.087v/ 40.87av abhidhātur vaśāt kiñ.cid
AHS6.40.088a/ ṛṣi.praṇīte prītiś cen muktvā caraka.suśrutau |
AHS6.40.088c/ bheḍādyāḥ kiṃ na paṭhyante tasmād grāhyaṃ su.bhāṣitam || 88 ||
AHS6.40.089a/ hṛdayam iva hṛdayam etat sarvāyur.veda.vāṅ.maya.payo.dheḥ |
AHS6.40.089c/ kṛtvā yac chubham āptaṃ śubham astu paraṃ tato jagataḥ || 89 ||
